title: Squares and Inches
description: After careful consideration, we have decided to change the unit of measurement for Ruinstars from Squares to Inches. This will make it much easier for new players to get started using their own terrain, battlemats, etc.

title: Published!
description: Ruinstars is officially published! You can now find the game on [itch.io](https://ruinstars.itch.io/ruinstars).

title: Ankh Revenants Updates
description: After thorough playtesting of the [Ankh Revenants](/factions/ANKH) faction, updated them for better balance.

title: Secondary Missions
description: Added support for secondary secret missions. You can now add secondary missions to your main mission, and they will be displayed in the mission list.
